name: Word-O-Rama
description:
For everyone who loves word search games!

Test your vocabulary size, be quick with your fingers and figure out as many words as you can – the time is running!

Goal of the Game Word-O-Rama is to find as many english words within a given time frame as possible.

★ Considerable and constantly updated dictionary containing more than 170 000 words
★ Selectable game field size of 4x4 or 5x5 letters
★ Selectable time limit of 2 or 3 minutes
★ Game Center Integration
★ Achievements awarded for special performance during the game
